name: I Wanna Be The Legend
description:
I Wanna Be The Legend is a fan game mix of I Wanna Be The Guy with a League of Legends theme. You play as The Kid on a journey to become a legend in the League of Legends game.

Controls can be reconfigured on the Main Menu screen.

This is more of a showcase of design and coding. I do not own any of the artwork.

This was made with Unreal Engine.
